metadata.title: CVE-2013-2114 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the chunk upload API in MediaWiki 1.19 through 1.19.6 and 1.20.x before 1.20.6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2013-2114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.7+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.7+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.7+dfsg-1').
